pullRequest.title: Global Styles Cleanup Act 2
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Continuation of #7402
Clearing out the GlobalThemeStyles file and moving specific styles to their appropriate components.
Motivation and Context


Clear out what gets rendered on every page
Existing eslint errors stayed or else this would have been an even larger PR
How Has This Been Tested?



Using built in snapshot tests and clicking through the app
Types of changes


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:



 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

nodes.bodyText:
Can we delete this from the global styles? 
  
    
      graylog2-server/graylog2-web-interface/src/theme/GlobalThemeStyles.jsx
    
    
         Line 1459
      in
      f0bb3dc
    
    
    
    

        
          
             .modal-body .form-group {
Could you please explain why we made this change here? I don't see where it's being used.
I think we don't need the className here any more, and same goes with the style definition in the global styles.

Stylelint complains about this:
Expected double colon pseudo-element notation (selector-pseudo-element-colon-notation)
